title: 407. Is There Really a “Loneliness Epidemic”?
description: That’s what some health officials are saying, but the data aren’t so clear. We look into what’s known (and not known) about the prevalence and effects of loneliness — including the possible upsides.
author: editor@freakonomics.com (Freakonomics Radio + Stitcher)
